WelcomeSection.p: This is a simple tool to help you calculate the length of cord you need for your macrame project. Just enter the dimensions of your project and we'll do the rest!

p.description: Enter the dimensions of your project and we'll calculate the length of cord you need.
p.note: Note: take into account that this calculation is only for the base cords, and not for the cords used to make the knots.
p.instructions: Enter below the width and height of the bracelet you want to make:

form.choose-start: Where are you starting your design from?

CalcForm.result: For a bracelet of height {{height,number}} and width {{width,number}}, starting from the {{start}}, you will need to cut {{cordAmount,number}} base cords of {{cordLength,number}} {{unit}} each.
